SpellDef.Description:
Attack and Knock target prone and back 1 tile.
See Tooltip.

SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Launch a %d Attack, knocks targets back 1 tile and knocks them prone.

SpellDef.Description:
Attack that reduces the victim's Battle Wisdom to 0 if it hits.
See Tooltip.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[T] BATTLE WISDOM DRAIN ::: Attack that reduces the victim's Battle Wisdom to 0 if it hits.
DOMAIN ::: Tactical ::: Enemy ::: Unit
EFFECT ::: Normal ATK ::: - Battle Wisdom
FIGHTABLE ::: Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Instant
OTHER ::: Can be Dodged
SOURCE ::: Equipment ::: ::: Shifty Depleter

Summon a random level 6 Aerial Ally.
See Tooltip.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[T] SUMMON AERIAL ALLY ::: Summon a random level 6 Aerial Ally.
DOMAIN ::: Tactical ::: Empty Tile
EFFECT ::: Random Creature (Air Elemental or Crow Demon) ::: ::: Level = 6 + Summon Bonus
FIGHTABLE ::: Not defendable ::: Not resistible
INTERVAL ::: Battle ::: Until Killed
OTHER ::: Summon Bonus
SOURCE ::: Equipment ::: ::: Aerial Conductor
